paper_abstract: Use cases have achieved wide use as specification tools for systems observable behavior, but there still remains a large gap between specifying behavior and determining the software components to build or procure. WUsCaM 05 - "Workshop on Use Cases in Model-Driven Software Engineering" - brought together use case and MDSE experts from industry and academia to identify and characterize problem areas and promising approaches.
paper_title: Use cases in model-driven software engineering
